answers.answer: You mentioned methadone in a prior post;  that will certainly cause significant constipation, which can lead to other health problems.  The opiates cause problems with behavior-- impulsivity, for example-- but have little chronic effect on the rest of the body.  I think Eagle is on the right track;  just because you used opiates doesn't mean you couldn't have an unrelated condition-- like diabetes, for example.  You need a good medical work-up, or at least a physical exam and some basic labwork.  If you cannot afford it, look for the county services or an academic institution-- they usually take indigent patients.
